Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

A Parker segítségével valós időben láthatod az utcai parkolóhelyek foglaltsági adatait, így gyorsabban megtalálod az éppen szabad helyeket, amivel rengeteg időt és üzemanyagot megspórolhatsz, valamint az idegeskedéssel töltött perceknek is búcsút inthetsz. A Parkerben külön beállíthatod azt is, ha mozgássérültek számára, rakodásra vagy elektromos autók töltésére fenntartott helyet keresel.

A Lidl eCharge alkalmazás segítségével a Lidl üzletek parkolóiban kialakított elektromos töltőállomásokon egyszerűbben töltheti elektromos meghajtású autóját.

Az alkalmazás segítségével megkeresheti a közelében található, elektromos töltőállomással rendelkező Lidl üzleteket, elindíthatja és leállíthatja a töltési folyamatot. Minden információt megtalál a töltőállomásainkról: a készenléti időszakot, a valós idejű foglaltságot, a csatlakozók számát és típusait, a töltőoszlopok teljesítményét és a pontos címet, melyekhez könnyen el is navigál az alkalmazás.
Töltés közben figyelemmel kísérheti a töltés időtartamát, sebességét és a felvett energiát.


Funkciók:
•	Az alkalmazással megkezdheti és leállíthatja az autó töltését
•	A közelben elérhető töltőállomások keresése
•	Térképes és listás szűrés az egyes csatlakozó típusokra
•	Navigáció a töltőoszlopokhoz 
•	A töltők aktuális foglaltságának kijelzése valós időben
•	Gyors üzembe helyezés a töltőállomásokon található QR-kód beolvasásával
•	Töltési előzmények megtekintése 
•	A Lidl üzletek töltőállomásainak összes aktuális információja, beleértve a készenléti időszakot

Használat:

1. Bejelentkezés a töltőpontra
A töltési folyamat megkezdéséhez azonosítsa magát mobilalkalmazásunk segítségével a töltési ponton.

2. Csatlakozás és feltöltés
Ezután kövesse az alkalmazás utasításait! A kijelző mutatja a töltési folyamat előrehaladását, és információt nyújt a töltés mennyiségéről. Várjon addig, amíg az oszlop kijelzőjén megjelenik a "Nyissa ki a fedelet, és csatlakoztassa a kábelt!" utasítás. Ekkor csatlakoztassa autóját a töltőoszlophoz! A töltési folyamat elkezdődik.

3. Töltés befejezése
Az alkalmazás tájékoztatja, ha a töltési folyamat lezárult. Húzza ki az oszlopból a töltőkábelt és zárja le a fedelet! A kijelzőn megjelenik a töltés időtartama.

Review and edit your waypoints, tracks, routes and activities in your library. Add them to a collection to keep all the recorded data from a certain trip together in one place. For example, if you’re taking a long trip, you can plan different waypoints, tracks and routes for each day of the trip and combine them into one collection.

Your Mobile Cloud Connection

The Garmin Explore app will send and store the waypoints, planned routes, GPS tracks and Garmin activities you've recorded in the cloud, allowing you to access and use that data on the Garmin Explore web site to plan or review your adventures. You can also sync your cloud-stored data with a compatible Garmin device. A Garmin account is needed to store your data in the cloud. Your activities (e.g., runs, walks, hikes, etc.) include data such as distance, pace, activity time, location, etc. that were recorded by your device.

More Off-grid Capability with inReach® Technology

Use Garmin Explore with your inReach enabled devices, such as the GPSMAP® 66i navigator and satellite communicator, to turn your mobile device into a true off-the-grid satellite companion. In an emergency, you can trigger an interactive SOS to the GEOS 24/7 emergency response team. Two-way messaging and LiveTrack location tracking via the 100% global Iridium® satellite network let you stay in contact globally. The Garmin Explore app allows you to access your phone’s contact list for easier messaging and sharing when connected.

What You Get with Garmin Explore

• Unlimited map downloads; access topographic maps, USGS quad sheets and more
• Aerial imagery
• Waypoints, tracking and route navigation
• High-detail GPS trip logging and location sharing
• Unlimited cloud storage of routes, waypoints, tracks, and activities
• Online trip planning

The SalzburgMobil app is the perfect trip assistant as you travel through Salzburg on public transportation. Get up-to-the-minute updates on scheduled departure times with integrated real-time information, receive bulletins about current service restrictions and disruptions, let our route planner show you the fastest route to your destination, and buy your ticket conveniently and simply right there on your smartphone.

The SalzburgMobil app can be downloaded for free


App functions in detail:

Departure monitor with interactive map display
If you activate the GPS locator on your mobile phone, the interactive map display in the SalzburgMobil app will show you your current location as well as all stops including departure times in your immediate area. With the help of the integrated search box at the top, you can find a specific stop whenever you wish and use the route planner to plot the best way to reach your destination. 

Route planner 
Planning your route has never been easier: Use the search function at the top of your screen in map view to enter your preferred destination. The system will automatically use your current location as the starting point. By pressing the red arrow button, you can also change the starting point manually if you wish. If you expect to make the trip on another day or at a different time, you can also adjust this manually by pressing the clock symbol. In addition to departure times for public transportation, the app will also suggest simple routes by bicycle, on foot, by car or taxi. Settings and filters
By selecting preferred modes of transportation and different options for sorting search results (number of transfers, duration, arrival, departure, price, CO2 emissions), you can individually determine and access relevant routes and information. My Altitude uses GPS signals to determine your current location, showing your latitude, longitude and altitude (height from sea level) barometric pressure and water boiling point.

It's a free app and does not have any limitations. In-App purchase can be used to remove the bottom advertisement and to support us.

This application does not need an internet connection and works best in outdoors.

By default, it uses device sensor to determine the elevation from see level, but you also have the option to use NOAA data files to get the altitude of your location. On newer devices, using device sensor is more accurate.

It also allows you to get a picture of where you are and save it in photo album. Picture will be sealed with coordinates of current location along with altitude and local date/time.

Barometric Pressure is calculated based on elevation. On newer devices such as iPhone 6/6+ value is being delivered directly from device built-in barometric sensor, this behavior is configurable and you can switch back to calculation mode.

App Features:
 - Elevation from see level in meter (metric) or feet (imperial)

 - Current location coordinates including latitude and longitude
 - Barometric pressure in various units extracted from device sensor or calculated from altitude
 - Water boiling point at your current location
 - Current weather information including temperature, condition, humidity, wind speed and wind bearing

We will send you a notification as soon as you get back behind the wheel so you never forget to stop your parking action and never overpay. 

• Traffic lights: certain traffic lights in the Netherlands will send their current status to the app. The number of these ‘smart’ traffic lights will be increasing in the future, allowing us to show you a countdown for the green light and speed recommendations to keep you in the green wave. 

• Apple Carplay for Flitsmeister on the screen of your car: navigate to your destination even more conveniently by displaying Flitsmeister on the screen of your car. Of course, you will also keep receiving the usual alerts for speed cams, traffic jams and hazards during your trip.

The DKV Mobility App is your practical everyday help. Whether you're looking for DKV Mobility service stations or charging points in Europe or within your neighbourhood area, or whether you want to wash or park your vehicle, or even settle your refuelling bill with your smartphone: Our app is always there to guide you to the desired result in just a few steps.

Paying after refuelling directly in your car?

The APP&GO feature guides you through the entire refuelling process: from selecting the nearest APP&GO station to authorising payment - the DKV Mobility App remains available to help you save valuable time in your daily routine.

Charging your electric vehicle?

The new update of the DKV Mobility App not only gives you access to over 66,000 fuel stations, but to also more than 200,000 public charging points in our network. It's easy and is just one click away. Another unique feature is the intelligent route planning, where the DKV Mobility App automatically calculates the best route with optimal charging stops for long distances.

Need to find a station quickly?

With our new home screen, you have instant access to the station closest to you. You can check the price and start navigation right away.

Actively managing time windows in which the DKV CARD can be used?

The activation mode "on demand" offers the possibility to activate cards only for the period in which they are used for a transaction. During the rest of the time, the card is inactive, and transactions will be declined. Simply start the 60-minute time window during which fuel can be purchased. After the time has expired, the card is automatically deactivated again.

What other benefits does the DKV Mobility App offer?

If you need immediate assistance, for example in the event of a breakdown or the loss of your card, the app offers direct dialing to connect you to the helpline.

You can find more information about our range of services at https://www.dkv-mobility.com/en/.

StreetCrowd is a technology platform that connects people to share mobility and micro-mobility companies. The goal is to help more people in cities get access to safe, clean, and reliable shared mobility options.
 
HOW IT WORKS
 
StreetCrowd users get paid to complete tasks for shared mobility providers. The main task focuses on driving shared cars from areas of low demand to high demand. Besides relocating cars, other options can include; electric car or scooter charging, cleaning, and other service tasks depending on your chosen provider. You will receive cash and shared mobility credits for each moved car, as well as other bonuses that you can earn on top of that. 
 
SIMPLE STEPS TO GET STARTED:
 
• Download our app and complete the registration process.
• Once your StreetCrowd and shared mobility provider accounts are approved, you’re ready to drive!
• In the app, locate the nearest car to you.
• Choose one of the three different destinations. 
• Open the car.
• Drive the car directly to any location within the zone.
• End trip and lock the car.
• Get paid.
 
Download the app and get started today!
 
To get more information visit https://www.streetcrowd.com
